questions.question: যদি cot ⁡ ( n π 2 + θ ) = 1 \cot \left(\frac{\mathrm{n} \pi}{2}+\theta\right)=1 cot ( 2 n π ​ + θ ) = 1 এবং θ = − π 4 \theta=-\frac{\pi}{4} θ = − 4 π ​ হয় তবে n এর মান কত?
questions.explanation: cot ⁡ ( n π 2 + θ ) = 1 ⇒ cot ⁡ ( n π 2 − π 4 ) = cot ⁡ π 4 ⇒ n π 2 − π 4 = π 4 ⇒ n π 2 = π 4 + π 4 = π 2 = n π 2 = π 2 ∴ n = 1. \begin{aligned} & \cot \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}+\theta\right)=1 \\ \Rightarrow & \cot \left(\frac{n \pi}{2}-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)=\cot \frac{\pi}{4} \\ \Rightarrow & \frac{n \pi}{2}-\frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{4} \\ \Rightarrow & \frac{n \pi}{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}+\frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{\pi}{2} \\ = & \frac{n \pi}{2}=\frac{\pi}{2} \\ \therefore & n=1 .\end{aligned} ⇒ ⇒ ⇒ = ∴ ​ cot ( 2 nπ ​ + θ ) = 1 cot ( 2 nπ ​ − 4 π ​ ) = cot 4 π ​ 2 nπ ​ − 4 π ​ = 4 π ​ 2 nπ ​ = 4 π ​ + 4 π ​ = 2 π ​ 2 nπ ​ = 2 π ​ n = 1. ​
